review: This thing is awesome.  We have three now, I give them as gifts to family.  If you're willing to share your password to Netflix or Hulu, your family can watch from their houses. There is a remote app for iPhone and iPad in case you lose the remote that comes with it.  Great for turning a regular TV into a smart tv.  If you already have a smart tv, you won't need this.

review: New Life for an old Plasma TV. This allowed me to take advantage of the Prime Videos I could not receive before having the Fire Stick.Now we can enjoy Prime Videos and so much more.If you have an older TV, with a free HDMI input and Wi-Fi home network, this is what you need to get streaming media. It is very easy to set up.Love it

review: This fire stick has good apps but is the biggest piece of crap when it comes to the Internet connection capabilities. I pay for extra high speed internet with a router not more than 25 feet away and it literally NEVER works. It is the only device of 6 we have that ever has problems keeping a connection. I would not recommend getting this product until they get a firmware update to fix the problem.
